citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:20 pm on
15-FEB-18. The inspector called the provided contact number and knocked on the facility door in attempts to
contact the registrant. Both attempts were unsuccessful.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:20 pm on
15-FEB-18.  The inspector called the provided contact number and knocked on the facility door in attempts to
contact the registrant.  Both attempts were unsuccessful.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection during business hours.
